name: Wall Ski Rack
description: Wall-mounted ski rack for organizing skis, available in STL and STEP formats for 3D printing.

name: Cube Piggy Bank
description: A customizable and openable piggy bank in the shape of a cube, ideal for personalizing with unique designs.

name: Customizable Jar
description: A fully customizable jar, perfect for personalizing in size and engraved text.

name: WiFi QR Stand
description: A convenient stand with QR code for quick WiFi connection.

name: KAWS Style Watch Holder
description: A KAWS-style watch holder for organizing your watches with an artistic touch.

name: Cattelan Middle Finger Replica
description: An artistic replica of Maurizio Cattelan's famous middle finger, a provocative and unique piece.

name: Snowflake Ornament
description: A beautifully designed snowflake ornament, perfect for decorating your home or Christmas tree during the holiday season.
